text: @Refugees Hey @Refugees @asmir1 @Alancumming we are a Glasgow (Scotland) charity doing our bit to help. Over 120,000 units of #soapaid to refugees in Europe right now. Over 175,000 units distributed around Scotland to beat Coronavirus too https://t.co/1RNk8tc956
